metadata.title: CVE-2023-52825 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdkfd: Fix a race condition of vram buffer unref in svm codeprange->svm_bo unref can happen in both mmu callback and a callback aftermigrate to system ram. Both are async call in different tasks. Sync svm_bounref operation to avoid random "use-after-free".

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
